attributes.action: Nobody voted for hard Brexit. We call on Parliament to prioritise jobs instead
attributes.background: The referendum did not ask people to factor in job losses to their decision.

rejection.details: However you might want to consider creating a new petition setting out what you would like the Government to negotiate when deciding the UK's future relationship with the European Union. The following petition might provide you with an example that you could follow https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/150220
